contents.markdown:
# Video: 00:00.000 => 00:42.520
Width: 640
Height: 360

Transcript
```
WEBVTT

00:02.480 --> 00:04.720
<Speaker 1>Need help redeeming a code on your Xbox?

00:05.440 --> 00:06.840
<Speaker 1>Follow these quick steps.

00:08.960 --> 00:15.680
<Speaker 1>Press the Xbox button on your controller to open the guide while signed into the console with the account you want to apply the code to.

00:16.720 --> 00:18.560
<Speaker 1>From the guide, select Store.

00:19.520 --> 00:25.040
<Speaker 1>Once opened, press the View button on the controller to open the side menu and select Redeem.

00:26.960 --> 00:29.840
<Speaker 1>Enter the 25-character code without the hyphens.

00:30.080 --> 00:32.080
<Speaker 1>Then follow steps to finish redeeming.

00:33.600 --> 00:34.640
<Speaker 1>Game on.

00:35.280 --> 00:36.160
<Speaker 1>Need more help?

00:36.240 --> 00:38.400
<Speaker 1>Go to support.xbox.com.
```

Problem.valueString: How to redeem a code on Xbox

Instructions.valueString: Press the Xbox button on your controller to open the guide while signed into the console with the account you want to apply the code to.
Once the Store is opened, press the View button on the controller to open the side menu and select Redeem.
Enter the 25-character code without the hyphens, then follow steps to finish redeeming.

valueArray.valueString: Ensure you are signed into the correct Xbox account.
Check if the code is entered correctly without hyphens.
Verify the code is still valid and not expired.

FinalOutcome.valueString: Successfully redeem a code on Xbox and access the associated content or service.
